name: Dandelisland: Conquer The Mountain
description:
Team: John Peroutka (Army of One)

Dandelisland: Conquer The Mountain is an experimental real time strategy game where you control a dandelion with the goal of scaling a mountainous island. Grow larger and larger with each generation of dandelion to assume control over the entire island!

Controls: 

WASD to move, 

click and drag to move the camera.

Scroll wheel to zoom in and out

Spacebar: Generate energy to grow

G: Enter/Exit grow mode
